UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Development of a novel short 12-meric papiliocin-derived peptide that is effective against Gram-negative sepsis.
Literature.Author: Kim J, Jacob B, Jang M, Kwak C, Lee Y, Son K, Lee S, Jung ID, Jeong MS, Kwon SH, Kim Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:0% Killing=50 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:0% Killing=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:10% hemolysis=200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli CCARM 1229(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 2004(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2002(MIC=16µM),Acinetobacter baumannii KCTC 2508(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii CCARM 12035(MIC=8µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=32µM),Salmonella typhimurium CCARM 8007(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3126(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=16µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=50µM)
